title: Spicy scrambled eggs on toast
ingredients: ['4 thick slices wholemeal bread', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 green chilli, deseeded and diced', '2 teaspoons curry paste', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '1 teaspoon grated ginger', '4 spring onions, chopped', '85 g (3 oz) tomatoes, peeled and diced', '6 eggs', 'I tablespoon chopped fresh coriander', '1 teaspoon lime juice', 'Salt and black pepper', '4 tablespoons low-fat natural yoghurt, optional']
